Note: 
If you have time, please add your publications to this Zotero Library:
https://www.zotero.org/groups/5945188/cmap-swfsc

Here are instructions for using Zotero:
https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/Zotero.html

To copy publications for your own Zotero library to the group library, select the desired items in your library, export as a Zotero RDF file, and then import that file to the group library.
